basics.name: Feng Sun
basics.label: Front-end Engineer
basics.summary: Make things stupid enough for everyone. 中文简历地址: https://stupidism.github.io/resume-cn/

work.summary: [Team1] Lead a team of 4 FEs for wework.cn. [Team2] Re-architecture a multi-team-and-multi-framework CMS project.
highlights: [Team1] Re-built wework.cn, recruited 3 FEs, lead 2 big revisions
[Team2] Proposed a new architecture using mono-repo and micro-frontend to solve the maintainance problems caused by multi languages and multi teams
Enhanced and kept test coverage over 95%.
Analyze requirments with PMs and break down tasks for other front-end engineers for over 6 months
Built a component library of more than 22 business components with designers.
Adopted new techs like styled-components, react-hooks, puppeteer, mono-repo, netlify, github actions, etc
Implemented A/B testing and ran over 5 tests with PMs and data engineers to roll up new features.
Designed a trackable workflow with branch-based test link and tag-based deploy strategy
Communicated and cooperated with FE engineers and EMs in other 4 other teams to push the proposal

work.summary: Work as the only front-end engineer and mainly develop data virtualization websites
highlights: Visualized air quality data with echarts and google-maps and used UI libraries like echarts, material-ui, bootstrap and antd.
Designed interactive wire-framing prototype with balsamiq for some of the projects.
Wrote many crawler scripts in NodeJS to crawl 3rd party aqi data.
Open-sourced a component lib, a test util and a starter.

work.summary: Developed and maintained an operational website written in AngularJS.
highlights: Developed a code generator and common lib and used them to optimize the project.

work.summary: Developed a C# project, fix bugs and write tests in a team.
highlights: Self-learn C# and use it in the project. Finished the 2-intern-and-2-month project alone in 1 month.
Fastest intern qualified to join a team.

volunteer.summary: I started and operated a community winthin HQ of WeWork aiming to provide affordable, healthy and delicious lunch for evenry colleague
highlights: Got about 220 welunch members out of 600 employees in our HQ. Got about 20 orders per day

volunteer.summary: Joined activities as a volunteer and organized some as a vice captain
highlights: Organize and give 'Interest Lessons' to a middle school near SJTU
Helped elders in a community to solve computer problems

awards.title: China SSOIE Competition 2nd Prize
awards.awarder: MOE of China, MOC of China, Wuxi Government
awards.summary: Led light coded transimition. 'SSOIE' for 'Student Service Outsourcing Innovation and Entrepreneurship'
